scripts.release:patch: node build/create-changeset.mjs patch && npx changeset version && npm run build && npx changeset publish
scripts.release:minor: node build/create-changeset.mjs minor && npx changeset version && npm run build && npx changeset publish
scripts.release:major: node build/create-changeset.mjs major && npx changeset version && npm run build && npx changeset publish
scripts.release:api-client: node build/create-changeset.mjs patch "Automated patch release" @locatienet/api-client && npx changeset version && npm --workspace @locatienet/api-client run build && npm --workspace @locatienet/api-client publish --access public
scripts.release:searchaddress: node build/create-changeset.mjs patch "Automated patch release" @locatienet/leaflet-searchaddress && npx changeset version && npm --workspace @locatienet/leaflet-searchaddress run build && npm --workspace @locatienet/leaflet-searchaddress publish --access public
scripts.prepublish:all: git add . && git commit -m "build for publish" && git push
